name: Death Party
description:
Actors sure love their overblown dramatic death scenes in the movies don't they? But why should they have all the fun? In Death Party you and your friends take turns obeying bizarre instructions and acting out tear jerking dramatic dying moments.

Warning: People have injured themselves playing this before so be careful ya?

Created by Chris Gregan and Sara Mena with music by Jason Farrell for the Dublin GameCraft 5 game jam.
